0: Welcome to your first day of training, Heist Meister. Please move to the next objective marker.Use the [W] [A] [S] [D] keys to move
1: Excellent. Next, we'll practice interacting wit objects. Open the door infront of you by clicking on it with a mouse. Remember that you'll need to be close enough to touch it
2: We've turned out the lights because you'll be working in the dark a lot. We've given you a T.O.U.C.A.N. night vision set. Cycle through the vision modes by pressing [SPACE]. Head to the next objective in the T.O.U.C.A.N. mode
3: The loot is show ahead. Pick it up by walking over to it
